data.comment: The big names in today's match at Children's Mercy Park have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Nashville.
Throw-in for Nashville at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 6, Nashville's Randall Leal is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Nashville in the half of Kansas City.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 11, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nashville's Alistair Johnston has been booked in Kansas City.
In the minute 13, Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Nashville.
Abu Danladi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Kansas City, Dave Romney of Nashville is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 14, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Nashville move into a 0-1 lead through a Walker Zimmerman header.
Randall Leal with an assist there.
In the minute 16, Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nashville defender.
Abu Danladi (Nashville) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Abu Danladi returns to the field for Nashville after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Nashville.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 19, Kansas City are coming forward and Johnny Russell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nashville at Children's Mercy Park.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 20, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In the minute 22, Nashville's Abu Danladi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 23, In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Johnny Russell. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes misses with an attempt on goal.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Gadi Kinda of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 27, Fotis Bazakos awards Nashville a goal kick.
Free kick Kansas City.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
In the minute 32, Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Nashville's area.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville's Randall Leal gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 36, Derrick Jones gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nashville.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick in a good position for Kansas City!
At Children's Mercy Park, Daniel Lovitz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
Throw-in for Nashville at Children's Mercy Park.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Kansas City drives forward and Johnny Russell gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Children's Mercy Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 48, Nashville are pushing forward but Abu Danladi's finish is wide of the goal.
Fotis Bazakos awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Kansas City make their first substitution with Erik Hurtado replacing Khiry Shelton.
In the minute 50, Nashville have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Kansas City.
Ilie Sanchez for Kansas City has been booked by Fotis Bazakos and receives a first yellow card.
Gianluca Busio levels the score at 1-1.
Great play from Johnny Russell to set up the goal.
In the minute 54, At Children's Mercy Park, Alistair Johnston has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Free kick Kansas City.
Kansas City push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Gianluca Busio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nashville defence.
In the minute 56, Kansas City are pushing forward but Gianluca Busio's finish is wide of the goal.
Fotis Bazakos awards Nashville a goal kick.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 58, Alex Muyl for Nashville drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nashville have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Alex Muyl with Eric Miller.
Taylor Washington is replacing Abu Danladi for the away team.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Kansas City.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Erik Hurtado. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Nashville at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Jalil Anibaba is replacing Walker Zimmerman for Nashville at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 65, Roger Espinoza is on a sub for Gianluca Busio for Kansas City.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 68, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 69, Fotis Bazakos signals a Kansas City throw-in in Nashville's half.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Nashville throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 71, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 76, Kansas City's Johnny Russell breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Derrick Jones (Nashville) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Derrick Jones with Jack Maher. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gary Smith.
Matt LaGrassa is replacing Brian Anunga for the away team.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 78, Roger Espinoza for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Kansas City have got their heads in front thanks to a Erik Hurtado strike.
Amadou Dia instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Salloi is on a sub for Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City.
Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a fourth substitution, with Luis Martins replacing Amadou Dia.
In the minute 82, Fotis Bazakos awards Nashville a goal kick.
Kansas City needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
Erik Hurtado for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Nashville.
Daniel Salloi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match has come to a close in Kansas City. The final score is 2-1.
